QuestData.Title: Barring Entry
QuestData.Description: Lao Softfoot and I scouted up the ruins to the north.$B$BIt looks like the mogu are infiltrating the valley through a cave just up the hill, and already they are sending formidable reinforcements through.$B$BThere are too many enemies to take them head on, so you'll have to meet Lao Softfoot at the entrance to the ruins.$B$BHe'll help you sneak in under the cover of stealth. Then, plant this keg of explosives at the mouth of the cave.$B$BThe rest should take care of itself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lao Softfoot at the entrance to Ruins Rise and follow him up the trail. Then, plant the Explosive Keg at the Ruins Rise Cave Entrance.
